Docs.summary: The NinePatch class permits drawing a bitmap in nine or more sections.

.method public hidebysig instance class Android.Graphics.Region GetTransparentRegion(class Android.Graphics.Rect bounds) cil managed
Public Function GetTransparentRegion (bounds As Rect) As Region
public: Android::Graphics::Region ^ GetTransparentRegion(Android::Graphics::Rect ^ bounds);
member this.GetTransparentRegion : Android.Graphics.Rect -> Android.Graphics.Region

Docs.param: The location and size of the NinePatch.
Docs.summary: Returns a Region representing the parts of the NinePatch that are completely transparent.
Docs.returns: null if the NinePatch has no transparent region to report, else a Region holding the parts of the specified bounds that are transparent.
